sourcesContent:
import React, { useRef,useState,useEffect } from 'react' import hamburger from '../../Asset/Img/hamburger.png' import croix from '../../Asset/Img/croixNoir.png' import github from '../../Asset/Img/github.png' import mail from '../../Asset/Img/mail.png' import linkedin from '../../Asset/Img/linkdins.png' import frFlag from '../../Asset/Img/frenchFlag.png' import engFLag from '../../Asset/Img/englishFlag.png' import scrollInToo from '../../fonction/navFonction/ScrollFonction' import { useContext } from 'react' import langueContext from '../../context/LangueContext' import UseAfficheMobilNav from '../../CustomHoocks/nav/UseAfficheMobilNav' export default function MobileNav() { const {setactive,x,burger,nav,langue,setlangue}=UseAfficheMobilNav(); return (
setactive(true)} ref={burger} className='sup480:w-[20px] absolute w-[15px] hover:cursor-pointer top-[100%] transition-all duration-150 ease-in z-50' src={hamburger} alt="" /> setactive(false)} ref={x} className='sup480:w-[25px] absolute w-[20px] hidden hover:cursor-pointer top-[95%] transform translate-x-[50px] opacity-0 transition-all duration-150 ease-in z-50' src={croix} alt="" />
scrollInToo(".projet")} className='sup768:text-[17px] sup480:text-[15px] text-[12px] hover:cursor-pointer' > {langue==="francais"?"Projet":"Project"} scrollInToo(".skills")} className='sup768:text-[17px] sup480:text-[15px] text-[12px] hover:cursor-pointer'> {langue==="francais"?"Compétences":"Skills"} scrollInToo(".presention")} className='sup768:text-[17px] sup480:text-[15px] text-[12px] hover:cursor-pointer'> {langue==="francais"?"Présentation":"About"}

setlangue("francais")} className='sup768:w-[23px] sup480:w-[21px] w-[19px] hover:cursor-pointer' src={frFlag} alt="" /> setlangue("anglais")} className='sup768:w-[23px] sup480:w-[21px] w-[19px] hover:cursor-pointer' src={engFLag} alt="" />

) }
